meta.title: Tagadapay Club
meta.description: A brief description of what Tagada Club offers

hero.title: Welcome to Tagadapay Club
hero.subtitle: Unlock exclusive deals, premium offers, and VIP benefits reserved for our most valued customers.

benefits.title: Why Join Tagadapay Club?
benefits.subtitle: Unlock a world of exclusive perks, premium services, and VIP treatment designed specifically for our most valued customers.

items.title: Lightning Fast Checkout
items.description: Skip the queue with our express checkout process. Complete your purchases in seconds, not minutes.

items.title: Exclusive Deals & Offers
items.description: Access to member-only discounts, early bird sales, and special promotions not available to regular customers.

items.title: Priority Support
items.description: Get dedicated customer support with faster response times and priority handling for all your inquiries.

offers.title: Member-Only Offers
offers.subtitle: Discover incredible deals and discounts available exclusively to Tagadapay Club members. Save more on your favorite products.

errorMessages.checkBack: Check back later for new offers

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Tagadapay Club.

items.question: What is Tagadapay Club?
items.answer: Tagadapay Club is a VIP membership with exclusive deals and benefits for our valued customers.

items.question: How do I redeem a deal?
items.answer: Click on a deal, review the bundle, and proceed to checkout to redeem it.

items.question: Can I cancel my membership?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime from your account portal.

testimonials.title: What our members say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from Tagadapay Club members.

items.name: Sophie M.
items.title: Member
items.quote: I've saved over €1,200 in just 6 months with Tagada Club. The weekly deals on electronics and fashion are incredible. Best investment ever!

items.name: Thomas L.
items.title: Member
items.quote: As a small business owner, Tagada Club has been a game-changer. I get early access to bulk deals and save 30-40% on my regular purchases. The membership pays for itself!

items.name: Emma R.
items.title: Member
items.quote: I was skeptical at first, but the exclusive flash sales and member-only discounts have saved me hundreds. The app notifications for new deals are super helpful!
